post.description:
Upload 1 or more files to RikAI2 for asynchronous processing. To receive the model output, use either a `webhook` or an `outputURL`:
- **`webhook` (Recommended)**: Receives a JSON response by default.
- `outputURL`: Receives a [ZIP file](../../outputurl) for each document in the request. If the `returnJSON` parameter is set to true, a JSON file will be provided instead.

parameters.name: apiVersion

schema.title: apiVersion
schema.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

parameters.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

get.description: Retrieves the status of an asynchronous request to `/rikai/bulk` or `/rikai/bulk/rikai2`. Identifiable by `statusId`.

parameters.name: apiVersion

schema.title: apiVersion
schema.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

parameters.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

answer.description: Model's answer to the question asked.

confidence.description: Answer confidence score ranging from 0 to 1.

context.description: Where in the document the answer was found.

translated.description: Translated answer if the `language` field was included in the request

model.description: Model used to process the document.

apiVersion.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

endTime.description: Request end time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

startTime.description: Request start time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

base64.description: Base64 encoded string for the file from which data will be extracted. If value is an array of base64 strings, each string will be combined into one PDF before getting run through the model.

question.description: A string containing the question to be asked.
examples: What is the name of the patient?

webhook.description:
Webhook URL to which status updates and JSON response will be sent. This is where you will receive the model output. 
[Here](../webhook-examples) is an example of a webhook URL response.

webhookHeaders.description: Request headers to include in the POST requests to the webhook.

webhookSendFull.description: Receive the full JSON response at the webhook URL upon request completion. Set to `false` to only receive request status.

fileId.description: Custom ID for uploaded file, returned as `documentId` in the response. Requests with multiple files accept unique fileIds for each file. FileIds can be used to facilitate tracking, referencing, and managing input and output files efficiently.

forceOCR.description: Will rasterize a pdf. Set this parameter to `true` only if the input file is a fillable pdf.

language.description: A language code (e.g. 'EN') or the name of the language you wish to translate answers into. [List of supported codes.](../../../prompting-guide/general/faq/#supported-languages)

metadata.description: Custom JSON to be included in the returned response.

outputURL.description: URL where resulting zip file or JSON can be sent. Must be open to PUT requests.

outputURLHeaders.description: Request headers to include in the PUT request to the output URL.

returnJSON.description: Set to `true` to send a JSON response rather than a ZIP file to the outputURL.

returnOCR.description: Set to `true` to include OCR results in response. Does not work if advanced_vision is also set to `true`.

sftp.description: SFTP authentication details. Required for SFTP URLs in `inputURL` or `outputURL`. Option to provide separate server authentication info for `inputURL` and `outputURL`.

staticIP.description: Set to `true` for static IP for webhook and outputURL if they exist

model.description: Model used to process the document.

statusId.description: A list of document IDs, each representing an uploaded file. Each ID is a randomly generated UUID. These IDs serve as input for retrieving the status of an asynchronous request via the `/rikai/zip/async/{statusId}` endpoint.

apiVersion.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

endTime.description: Request end time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

failedRequests.description: File requests that failed to queue.

startTime.description: Request start time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

examples.question: What is the name of the patient?

inputURL.description: URL for the file to extract data from: Must be a PDF, JPEG, JPG, PNG, TIFF, TIF or TXT.

examples: What is the name of the patient?

apiVersion.description: API version used for the request. Defaults to the latest production version. To pin to a specific API version, please contact your Lazarus representative to receive the appropriate version header.

baseModel.description: Base model used during data extraction.

data.description: Question and answer data for each question asked in the request.

documentId.description: The unique identifier for the document. If `fileId` is supplied in the request, it is used as the `documentId`; otherwise, a random UUID is generated.

endTime.description: Request end time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

ocrResults.description: OCR results from the document. Returned only if `returnOCR` was set to true in the request.

settings.description: JSON containing any custom user settings specified in the request.

startTime.description: Request start time recorded in epoch (Unix timestamp) format.

password.description: SFTP password. Either `password` or `privateKey` are required.

privateKey.description: Base64 encoded SFTP private key. Either `password` or `privateKey` are required.

privateKeyPassphrase.description: Optional passphrase to use if private key is protected.

advancedVision.description: Set to `true` to enable advanced features such as checkboxes and tables.

400.description: Bad request or failure to read. Request was invalid or we could not process your data.

value.message: Request body is missing required field(s): question

403.description: Unauthorized attempt. There was an issue with your credentials, model permissions or billing.

404.description: Not found error. When a request references an invalid endpoint or resource.

500.description: An internal server error or model processing failed. Extraction model or LLM could not process your request.

value.message: Error during request to OCR microservice.
We made three attempts to process the model with no success.
An internal error occurred. Please report this to support@lazarusai.com.
An internal error occurred. Please report this to support@lazarusai.com.
